mapper.insert: insert into training_assistant (id, name, account, password, create_time, update_time, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
